text: 16:10 Jon 3:14; Aposel 2:32; 5:31; Rom 4:25Arazir aghuimɨn mɨngarim, a kamakɨn, kɨ Afeziam bagh mangɨghtɨ, ia ua nan ganighan kogham.16:10 Nguazir kamɨn gumazamiziba Iesus isa kot gatɨgha ghaze, an arazir kuram gami, egh an ovengam. Ezɨ God Iesus gamizɨ a ua dɨkavizɨ anenigha ghuzɨ, an a ko iti. Arazir kamra, God gumazamizibar akagha ghaze, Iesus arazir aghuimram ami.
